description: Otter.ai uses an AI Meeting Assistant to transcribe meetings in real time, record audio, capture slides, extract action items, and generate an AI meeting summary.
title: Otter.ai - AI Meeting Note Taker & Real-time AI Transcription
introduction: Otter is an AI-powered meeting notes application that offers automatic transcription, speaker identification, live transcription, and collaboration features. It allows users to record and transcribe meetings in real-time, import and transcribe pre-recorded audio/video files, and customize vocabulary. Otter also provides playback options, collaboration tools, and administration and security features like encryption and activity logs.
features: Automatic transcription of English speech to text with accents
Live transcription of recordings via the Otter app
Automatic sync of audio/video files from Dropbox
Automatic sync of cloud recordings from Zoom
Integrated live notes and captioning for Zoom
Live transcription via RTMP (additional fees apply)
Real-time annotation with highlights, text notes, comments, and images
Automated Slide Capture for virtual meetings
Sharing via private channels and public links
targetPeople: Professionals who attend meetings and need accurate and detailed notes

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: No, there is no free trial available for Otter.

faqs.question: What is the maximum monthly transcription limit per user?
faqs.answer: The maximum monthly transcription limit per user is 6000 minutes.

faqs.question: Does Otter support collaboration features?
faqs.answer: Yes, Otter supports collaboration features such as real-time annotation, automated slide capture, and sharing via private channels and public links.
